section.title: Introduction
section.p:
Cross project reporting allows you to report on multiple Mingle projects on a single Mingle project wiki page or card.
For data series and stack bar charts you can also report on multiple projects on a single chart.
This allows you to access data from multiple Mingle projects at once and see the data in a single cohesive view.

screenshot.alttext: Two projects reporting on the same page - 1
Two projects reporting on the same page - 2

section.p: This feature is particularly useful for large programs of work where you can view individual projects summaries in the context of other projects within the same program.
To create cross project reports like these use the macro's "project" parameter at the chart or the series level. Review the macro reference for more information.
section.hint: The daily history chart does not support the use of the project parameter and therefore, cannot be used to create cross project reports.
